name: Find a Way Demo
description:
Find a way is a puzzle game in which your goal is to swap and rotate map tiles to create a correct map (without any dead ends) that meets all the level constraints. There can be more than one solution for each level.

Sounds easy? Give it a try!

This demo version contains the first 8 levels.

The full version can be found here:
https://bwdesign.itch.io/find-a-way

Music from https://incompetech.com "Life of Riley" by Kevin MacLeod "Carefree" by Kevin MacLeod "Fretless" by Kevin MacLeod License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
